value.halfverse: you have come to your people and set them free.
value.verse: Blessed be the Lord, the God of Israel; *

value.halfverse: born of the house of your servant David.
value.verse: You have raised up for us a mighty savior, *

Through your holy prophets you promised of old,
that you would save us from our enemies, *
value.halfverse: from the hands of all who hate us.
and to remember your holy covenant.
value.verse: To show mercy to our forebears *

value.halfverse: to set us free from the hands of our enemies,
value.verse: This was the oath you swore to our father Abraham, *
Free to worship you without fear, *
value.halfverse:
holy and righteous before you,
all the days of our life.
for you will go before the Lord to prepare the way,
value.verse: And you, child, shall be called the prophet of the Most High, *

value.halfverse: by the forgiveness of their sins.
value.verse: To give Godâ€™s people knowledge of salvation *

value.halfverse: the dawn from on high shall break upon us,
value.verse: In the tender compassion of our God *

value.halfverse: and to guide our feet into the way of peace.
value.verse:
To shine on those who dwell in darkness
and the shadow of death, *
